  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

    • processFilesForValidation

      public static void processFilesForValidation​(java.io.File[] files)
      Processes an array of files by reading CSV files and writing into LATEX files. If file is valid, information read from the CSV file is written into the LATEX file. If an attribute or any data are missing, writing to a file stops and the line with the missing information is written into a log file depending on the type of info missing.
      Parameters:
      files - an array of files

    • deleteFiles

      public static void deleteFiles​(java.lang.String dirName)
      Deletes the files and prints the msg whether the file is deleted or not
      Parameters:
      dirName - a String of the folder with latex files

    • readAttrib

      public static java.lang.String[] readAttrib​(java.lang.String attrLine) throws csv2latex2.CSVFileInvalidException
      Processes the line of attributes from the CSV file
      Parameters:
      attrLine - a String of attributes
      Returns:
      an array of attributes
      Throws:
      csv2latex2.CSVFileInvalidException - is attribute is missing

    • readData

      public static java.lang.String[] readData​(java.lang.String dataLine) throws csv2latex2.CSVDataMissing
      Processes the data from CSV files
      Parameters:
      dataLine - a string of data
      Returns:
      array of data
      Throws:
      csv2latex2.CSVDataMissing - if data is missing
